name: RandomSportsQuote
0:
”Alexa, open random sports quote”
”Alexa, begin random sports quote”
”Alexa, run random sports quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random sports quote
des:
Need a quick burst of inspiration to help you achieve sports greatness? Or just some motivation to get through a challenge? 

Just say 'Alexa, open random sports quote' and you'll enjoy words of wisdom from a sporting legend. Nearly 100 quotes give you new inspiration as often as you need it. 

You can do this! Get out and there and give it your all! Just say, "Alexa, open random sports quote" and get pumped!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
